definitions.definition: Any set of computer networks that communicate using the Internet Protocol. (An intranet.)
The Internet, the largest global internet.
An internet connection, internet connectivity, access to the internet.
definitions.example: Do you have internet at your place?  My internet is down and I want to check my email.

definitions.definition: A fictitious unit of scoring, awarded for making outstanding posts.
To use the Internet; to search for something using the Internet; to surf the Internet.
definitions.example: Having no idea what that means, I am internetting like mad.
